channel.title: Greene County, OH - Alert Center
channel.description: Greene County, OH - Get the latest alerts

item.title: Level One Snow Emergency Issued
item.description: The Greene County Sheriff's Office has issued a Level One Snow Emergency.

item.title: Level One Snow Emergency Issued
item.description: The Greene County Sheriff's Office has issued a Level One Snow Emergency.

item.title: Animal Control opening at noon on Saturday, Jan 12th
item.description: Animal Control will be opening two hours later than normal on Saturday, January 12th and will be open from 12pm - 4pm

item.title: Greene CATS Scheduled Rides Cancelled Today, Saturday, January 13
item.description: Due to hazardous road conditions all Greene CATS scheduled rides have been cancelled for today, Saturday, January 13. Flex Routes will operate as normally scheduled.
